extendedInfo.description: Behavior Status is aimed at Parents and Teachers alike.  Use it to record the daily behavior of your child or an entire classroom.  Behavior Status is easily recoded using the simple Green/Yellow/Red stoplight mechanism currently employed by many schools, daycares and parents alike.  Great for use in teaching kids with Autism or ADD/ADHD. The app also lets you view behavior changes over time on a child by child basis using the color coded calendar view.  Use this history information to help encourage good behavior with simple rewards.  Recent updates added the ability to store notes as you make status changes and better support for teachers.Free Version Features:- Track Overall Behavior- Basic Status Input Red/Yellow/Green- Alternate Status Input which supports up to 5 colors.- Record Notes throughout the day- Neutral Status- Email Status Reports- Easily correct past days- Group Children by Class- Easy Add/Edit Child, Classes, etc- Sort Problem Kids to the Top- 24 Hour Time Option- Home Screen Widget- Checking for new blog posts on BehaviorStatus.com- Specific Behavior Tracking- Enable Specific Behavior Tracking by Child- Add/Edit/Delete Specific Behaviors by Child- Copy Specific Behaviors from one child to another- Stats and GraphingFeatures enabled by Donate Version:- Disable AdsKW: behavior status, behavior tracking, behavior, autism, add, adhd, odd

reviews.title: Good program.
reviews.comment: Easy to quickly log information.  Emails reports easily.  However, not all the status levels appear in report when using the 5 leveled scale.  Fix this for higher rating.
reviews.author: c. lynn baker

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: The video is not the same as the actual interaction.
reviews.author: matt barnes

reviews.title: watching my own behaviours
reviews.comment: I am an adult and I am going to use this app to note if I have done my 30 minutes of exercise daily (green), or eaten chocolates (red). A really simple way to track the development of these habits. I may even give myself a reward if I have several days/weeks of green in a row :D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: I love the behavior log. I have tried several different behavior trackers, but this is the most user friendly and easiest for tracking specific behaviors. I installed the donate app and I wanted to add more levels of gaging behavior. Is this possible?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Super adhd
reviews.comment: Great app! We\'ve been doing this for a long time... I when ask my son what color he thinks & we talk bout it & yep he got the color! We both love it! Amazed he usually says the same color I think!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great App!
reviews.comment: My daughter has a number of behavior issues and this helps me track all of her habits and gives a great visual of how prominent each one is and where her doctors and I should focus. With two other kids i can\'t always remember off the top of my head when we go to her appointments. That\'s where this app has made a huge difference! And I love the fact that I can add my other children if the need arises.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and effective
reviews.comment: Tried a few other reward charts but always get bogged down in the detail or else feel they are liable to misuse. This one is flexible enough to allow parents to track patterns and comment on whatever the concern is. The highly visual traffic light system is easily understood by the child without having to labour the point. Sometimes a little confusing navigating though historical data but overall my favourite behaviour app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Special Ed. Teacher
reviews.comment: I love this app because it is simple to use.  I tried several others, but they were too detailed.  I have a special day class with severe and moderate students in it.  I needed something that was quick, but also allowed me to communicate with parents and behaviorists.  This app has saved me so much time and allowed me to track their behaviors more efficiently.  I love the graph and the ability to send others an email with the tracking data.  It has helped me to document and to gain services for my students.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have!!!!!
reviews.comment: Have to have when I\'m watching bad children
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: fantastic tool for teachers!
reviews.comment: a must-have app for teachers and people in management! a great way to Keep track of behaviour and behaviour patterns!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Don\'t get
reviews.comment: They prompt you to upgrade every time you click on anything
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs an install to SD option
Middle school teacher
reviews.comment: Would give five stars if I was able to import students\' names, if specific behaviors could be exported in bulk per student and per class and not just 1 behavior @ a time. Otherwise this app has tremendous potential.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I have adult adhd and used this app to track my own behaviour. Very useful to find patterns and triggers, i would recommend to other adhd adults.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: This works every time, even on my 12 year old.
reviews.author: A Google User
